entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 6:37 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or freezing rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain changing to rain in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 6:37 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
